input.sentences: disney puts on a show on ice that features a bunch of different disney characters .
you can see [male] and [female] duck singing a tune .
you can see aladdin and [female] dancing on the ice .
beauty and the beast even makes an appearance .
however | the most beautiful part was the love the audience can see between cinderella and [male] charming . they are such a cute couple .
output.sentences: The crowd was so excited to watch Disney on Ice!
Donald and Daisy showed everyone how much they love each other with their dance.
Aladdin and Jasmine blew the crowd away with their amazing stunts!
Everyone was impressed with Belle and Beasts coordination together!
And of course it wouldn't be complete without Cinderella and her Prince Charming!
